div.p: a The relationship between homozygosity weighted by locus (HL) and the second principal component derived from pup data on changes in body length, mass and IgG concentration in the control colony (GLM: estimate = 16.75, SE = 7.58, p = 0.039; Tables 2 and 3); ( b) the relationship between homozygosity weighted by locus (HL) and total leukocyte concentration (10 9/l) in juveniles in the human-impacted colony (GLMM: estimate = 5.98, SE = 2.21; LRT: χ 2 = 7.29, p = 0.006; Tables 2 and 3)
